kalaniya wishwawidyalayeth injineru pitayak aarambha kirimata mulika katayuthu sudanam kota thibeinjineru pitayak aarambha kirimata awashya akkara nawayaka (09) idamak labaganimata amathi mandala pathrikawak me wana witath idiripath kota athayi kalaniya wishwawidyalaye upakulapathi mahacharya sunanda mandumabandara mahatha anawaranaya keleya.me yojanawa kriyathmaka wimath samanga kalaniya wishwawidyalaya anga sampurna widyayathanayak bawata path wana bawada upakulapathiwaraya sandahan kaleya.kalaniya wishwawidyalayiya aadi widyarthinge sansadaya mulikathwayen shishyathwa ha newasikagara aramudalak sthapitha karalima pilibandawa wu wadapiliwela elidakwu wishesha hamuwedi upakulapathiwaraya me adahas dakwa sitiyeya.
